name: SAP Joule

commands.description: How do I set up collaboration in SAP's product lifecycle management?
commands.title: Access Help Documentation

longDescription:
SAP Joule revolutionizes how you interact with your SAP business systems, making every touch-point count and every task simpler. SAP Joule guides you through content discovery within the SAP Ecosystem providing transparent role-based access to the relevant processes from everywhere.

Leveraging its generative AI capabilities, SAP Joule aims to understand your requests, retrieve information, and complete your tasks in a conversational way. For example, instead of manually navigating to a feature or page buried deep, you can describe the current task to Joule, who can help automate tasks or take you to places where you can find desired data.

When SAP Joule integrates with Microsoft 365 Copilot / Microsoft Teams, you can link to your business information, find the information to complete your tasks, navigate to the required functionality, and retrieve necessary information from the SAP Help Portal or from documents uploaded to the SAP Joule system without leaving the application you're working in. The app connects to SAP Solutions that have been previously integrated with SAP Joule and allows SAP Solution users to connect with relevant business data.

SAP Joule supports three capability types: transactional, navigational, and informational. Depending on the capabilities available with your SAP solution, you can use SAP Joule to find and navigate to apps, find business information, complete tasks, and find product information.

 - **Transactional**: A transactional capability can help customers create, view, update or delete business data without having to navigate to the respective apps.

 - **Navigational**: A navigational capability helps users find and navigate to the functionality or apps they're looking for without having to go through multiple links to reach a destination.

 - **Informational**: An informational capability helps users retrieve necessary information from the SAP Help Portal or documents uploaded to the Joule service if you've Set Up Document Grounding. Joule searches available documentation and its own knowledge base to find the answer to your query and summarizes the search results and provides the summarization as the answer to your question, along with the top three search results.

Note: To use SAP Joule with Microsoft 365 Copilot / Microsoft Teams, you must have a license for Microsoft 365 Copilot / Microsoft Teams and have a licensed SAP Solution integrated with SAP Joule. For more information click [here](https://help.sap.com/docs/JOULE/3fdd7b321eb24d1b9d40605dce822e84/a13fba6ff9e14a6d8455185be5d89682.html?version=CLOUD).

Joule is powered by Generative AI and all output should be reviewed before use. Please do not enter any sensitive personal data and avoid entering any other personal data you do not wish to be processed. You can report an incident or error through the SAP Support Portal. For more information, see Getting Support.

[Getting Started Resources](https://help.sap.com/docs/JOULE/a566dd86443f447aadfb5dfd9e1b7acc/702f3db8996a4a5bbceb6abd33c3ec69.html)

[User Guide](https://help.sap.com/docs/JOULE/3fdd7b321eb24d1b9d40605dce822e84/38636457acc346daa4ff7069f041a11a.html?version=CLOUD)

Feedback: If you want to provide feedback, please open a support ticket.
shortDescription: SAP Joule can help you access all your business data from one place.

examplePrompts.prompt: @SAP Joule, can you help me manage absences for my team this week?
examplePrompts.description: The user requests assistance with managing team absences.

examplePrompts.prompt: @SAP Joule, I need support with onboarding a new hire. What resources are available?
examplePrompts.description: The user seeks assistance with supporting a new hire.

examplePrompts.prompt: @SAP Joule, where can I find the help documentation for using the new software update?
examplePrompts.description: The user wants to access help documentation related to a software update.
